item.title: Fabvl - Fortnite Rap Song
item.description:
Fortnite Rap Song - Go (Season 10 Battle Royale) by FabvL. Itâ€™s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Video source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nlBIXaevobI Chords Used: Am F E7
The boomwhacker / handbell version of this playalong may be found here: https://youtu.be/sc9TvnD2pfM .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Blanco Brown - The Git Up - Key of C
item.description:
The Git Up by Blanco Brown. Itâ€™s been lowered by 4 semitones to the key of C so beginner instruments can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C (c,e,g) & F (f,a,c). If playing chords by note, the â€œDâ€ and â€œBâ€ notes are never used.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Silento - Watch Me - Key of Dm
item.description:
For educational use.
SilentÃ³ singing Watch Me (Whip/Nae Nae), with the pitch lowered 3 half steps so beginner ukulele students can play along.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Jason Derulo - Colors - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Colors on the ukulele by Jason Derulo. The chords used are C F G Am. (Original in Eb)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Jason Derulo - Colors - Key of D
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Colors on the ukulele by Jason Derulo. The chords used are D G A Bm. (Original in Eb)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Jay Z - Ni**as in Paris
item.description: https://vk.com/aboutukulele Today we will analyze a wonderful hip-hop track! A simple motive, what you need for a beginner. Enjoy watching!
